synonyms.synonym: Myosin light chain 1 slow-twitch muscle A isoform
Smooth muscle and nonmuscle myosin light chain alkali 6B

protein.specific_function: Regulatory light chain of myosin. Does not bind calcium

reference.reference_text: Hailstones DL, Gunning PW: Characterization of human myosin light chains 1sa and 3nm: implications for isoform evolution and function. Mol Cell Biol. 1990 Mar;10(3):1095-104.
Zimmermann K, Starzinski-Powitz A: A novel isoform of myosin alkali light chain isolated from human muscle cells. Nucleic Acids Res. 1989 Dec 25;17(24):10496.
